transcripts.text: Chances are.  you've seen them.  Those drivers on the road, apparently alone in a car, wearing a mask.

I see your face and I just want it to be masked.  No breathing anymore unless it's through a mask.  I see them walking by with eyes and lips and nose.  I must take six feet back until the rona goes.
